messages.message: If I am trying to call the instabase API from a UDF, is there an env variable I can read to figure out what host I should be using?

not that I am aware of. This is a big gap in our architecture IMO
https://12factor.net/config

Yeahâ€¦ makes it kinda of impossible to figure out how to call model service via HTTP from a UDF. @Heymian @shaunak I may just bite the bullet and add API host and also an auth key to UDF context - how easy is it to create an access token? Note sure who would need to sign off on this, I can make a PR to demonstrate as well
also makes it impossible to build integration tests for multiple environment levels :stuck_out_tongue:
